about.heading: About Piyush Bholla
about.paragraph1: With over 8 years of experience in Indian fashion styling, I've had the privilege of working with Bollywood celebrities, fashion designers, and brides to create stunning looks that celebrate our rich cultural heritage.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines traditional Indian aesthetics with contemporary styling, always honoring the cultural significance while adding modern flair. Whether it's a bridal lehenga, elegant saree draping, or festival ethnic wear, I believe every outfit should tell a story of grace and tradition.

aboutPage.heroParagraph1: A passionate Indian fashion stylist and creative director with over 8 years of experience in celebrating the beauty of traditional Indian wear. My journey began with a deep love for our rich cultural heritage and the timeless elegance of ethnic fashion.
aboutPage.heroParagraph2: I believe that Indian fashion is more than just clothing—it's a celebration of our culture, traditions, and artistry. Every saree drape, every bridal ensemble, and every ethnic look I create tells a story of grace, tradition, and contemporary elegance.
aboutPage.philosophyQuote: Indian fashion is not just about following trends—it's about honoring our heritage while creating contemporary magic. Every saree drape, every jewelry piece, and every ethnic ensemble should celebrate our culture while empowering the wearer.
aboutPage.philosophyDescription: This philosophy guides every decision I make, from the initial concept to the final styling touches.

portfolio.heading: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A comprehensive showcase of Indian fashion styling work across bridal, saree styling, celebrity looks, and festival wear, demonstrating expertise in traditional and contemporary ethnic fashion.

portfolioProjects.title: Elegant Contemporary Fusion
portfolioProjects.description: A beautiful blend of traditional handloom fabrics with modern silhouettes, featuring delicate pleating and ruffled details that create a timeless yet contemporary look.
portfolioProjects.fullDescription: This project showcases the perfect marriage of traditional Indian textiles with contemporary design sensibilities. The handloom fabrics were carefully selected to honor our textile heritage while the modern silhouettes appeal to today's fashion-forward audience.

portfolioProjects.title: Royal Bridal Collection
portfolioProjects.description: An opulent bridal styling project featuring traditional red and gold lehengas with intricate zardozi work, creating a regal and timeless bridal look.
portfolioProjects.fullDescription: This bridal project was inspired by royal Rajasthani heritage. Every element from the heavy lehenga to the traditional jewelry was carefully curated to create a majestic bridal ensemble that honored tradition while ensuring the bride felt like royalty.

portfolioProjects.title: Bollywood Red Carpet Glamour
portfolioProjects.description: A stunning red carpet look featuring a contemporary saree with modern draping techniques, styled for a leading Bollywood actress at a major film awards ceremony.
portfolioProjects.fullDescription: For this high-profile red carpet appearance, we reimagined the traditional saree with a modern twist. The contemporary draping style combined with statement jewelry created a look that was both elegant and fashion-forward, perfect for the glamorous event.

portfolioProjects.title: Festive Ethnic Elegance
portfolioProjects.description: A vibrant collection of festival wear styling featuring colorful lehengas, anarkalis, and sarees perfect for Diwali and wedding season celebrations.
portfolioProjects.fullDescription: This festive collection celebrates the joy and vibrancy of Indian festivals. Each outfit was styled to capture the essence of celebration while ensuring comfort and elegance. The color palette and traditional embellishments reflect the festive spirit.

faq.question: How far in advance should I book your services?
faq.answer: I recommend booking 4-6 weeks in advance for most projects. For wedding season (October-March) and festival periods, booking 2-3 months ahead is ideal. Rush projects may be accommodated with additional fees.

faq.question: Do you travel for projects?
faq.answer: Yes, I'm available for travel across India and internationally. Travel expenses (flights, accommodation, meals) are additional to the styling fee and will be discussed during the consultation phase.

faq.question: What's included in your styling services?
faq.answer: All services include initial consultation, concept development, outfit sourcing, styling session, and post-styling notes. For bridal services, this includes trial sessions and jewelry coordination.
